doc.field: American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA), New York Local Office Records
American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA), New York Local Office Records

One of AFTRA's major functions as a union is to negotiate contracts, including aspects like wages and working conditions, for its members. The majority of the records in this series document contracts with local New York radio and television networks, with a specific emphasis on daytime drama programming and live performances taking place in the greater New York City area (such as the New York City Ballet and the New York Philharmonic). The series also includes numerous "waivers," exceptions to existing contract rules for entities interested in hiring AFTRA members.
American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA), New York Local Office Records
